briefTitle: The Consistency of Drug Screening in Vitro and Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy Results in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: The Consistency of Drug Sensitivity in Vitro and Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy Results in Vivo for Early Breast Cancer Patients
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Consistency rate of drug sensitivity in vitro and in vivo
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* invasive breast cancer candidates for neoadjuvant chemotherapy agreed to participate in this observative experiments could receive operation normal liver and renal function

Exclusion Criteria:

* inflammatory breast cancer recurrent breast cancer
